attributes.action: change the national anthem to the horrible histories Kings and Queens song
attributes.additional_details: out current anthem is very monotonous and boring. the King's and Queens song captures the true essence of British history without the racist undertones of our current anthem. it is also more catchy.

rejection.details:
This isn’t something that the UK Government or Parliament would be able to do. The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
